sourcesContent:
// src/components/Dashboard.js
import React from 'react';
import { Box, Grid, Paper, Typography, Avatar, IconButton, Divider, List, ListItem, ListItemIcon, ListItemText, Badge } from '@mui/material';
import NotificationsIcon from '@mui/icons-material/Notifications';
import ChatBubbleOutlineIcon from '@mui/icons-material/ChatBubbleOutline';
import EventIcon from '@mui/icons-material/Event';
import FlashOnIcon from '@mui/icons-material/FlashOn';
import AccountBalanceWalletIcon from '@mui/icons-material/AccountBalanceWallet';
import SchoolIcon from '@mui/icons-material/School';
import { styled } from '@mui/material/styles';

const Dashboard = () => {
  return (
    <Box component="main" sx={{ flexGrow: 1, p: 3, backgroundColor: '#2c2c2c', color: '#fff', minHeight: '100vh' }}>
      <Grid container spacing={2}>
        <Grid item xs={12}>
          <Box display="flex" justifyContent="space-between" alignItems="center">
            <Typography variant="h4">Hello, [Student Name]!</Typography>
            <Box>
              <IconButton color="primary">
                <Badge badgeContent={4} color="error">
                  <NotificationsIcon sx={{ color: 'teal' }} />
                </Badge>
              </IconButton>
              <Avatar alt="Student Profile" src="/static/images/avatar/1.jpg" />
            </Box>
          </Box>
        </Grid>

        {/* Balance Overview */}
        <Grid item xs={12}>
          <StyledPaper>
            <Typography variant="h6" sx={{ display: 'flex', alignItems: 'center' }}>
              <AccountBalanceWalletIcon sx={{ mr: 1, color: 'teal' }} /> Your Balance: R[Balance Amount]
            </Typography>
          </StyledPaper>
        </Grid>

        {/* Active Progress Section */}
        <Grid item xs={12} md={6}>
          <StyledPaper>
            <Typography variant="h6" sx={{ display: 'flex', alignItems: 'center' }}>
              <FlashOnIcon sx={{ mr: 1, color: 'teal' }} /> Active Progress
            </Typography>
            {/* Add components to show notes and flashcard progress */}
            <List>
              <ListItem>
                <ListItemIcon>
                  <FlashOnIcon sx={{ color: 'teal' }} />
                </ListItemIcon>
                <ListItemText primary="Flashcards: 75% Completed" />
              </ListItem>
              <ListItem>
                <ListItemIcon>
                  <SchoolIcon sx={{ color: 'teal' }} />
                </ListItemIcon>
                <ListItemText primary="Notes Reviewed: 50%" />
              </ListItem>
              <ListItem>
                <ListItemIcon>
                  <SchoolIcon sx={{ color: 'teal' }} />
                </ListItemIcon>
                <ListItemText primary="Quizzes: 2 out of 5 completed" />
              </ListItem>
            </List>
          </StyledPaper>
        </Grid>

        {/* Upcoming Sessions Section */}
        <Grid item xs={12} md={6}>
          <StyledPaper>
            <Typography variant="h6" sx={{ display: 'flex', alignItems: 'center' }}>
              <EventIcon sx={{ mr: 1, color: 'teal' }} /> Upcoming Sessions
            </Typography>
            {/* Add SessionCard components to list upcoming sessions */}
            <List>
              <ListItem>
                <ListItemText primary="Math - Algebra" secondary="Sep 10, 10:00 AM" />
              </ListItem>
              <ListItem>
                <ListItemText primary="Biology - Genetics" secondary="Sep 11, 12:00 PM" />
              </ListItem>
            </List>
          </StyledPaper>
        </Grid>

        {/* Messaging Section */}
        <Grid item xs={12}>
          <StyledPaper>
            <Typography variant="h6" sx={{ display: 'flex', alignItems: 'center' }}>
              <ChatBubbleOutlineIcon sx={{ mr: 1, color: 'teal' }} /> Messages
            </Typography>
            <Divider sx={{ my: 1 }} />
            {/* Add MessagingSection component to handle chat messages */}
            <List>
              <ListItem>
                <ListItemText primary="John Doe" secondary="Hi, can you help me with my assignment?" />
              </ListItem>
              <ListItem>
                <ListItemText primary="Tutor Anna" secondary="Don't forget your session tomorrow at 10 AM!" />
              </ListItem>
            </List>
          </StyledPaper>
        </Grid>

        {/* Additional Section: Alerts or Reminders */}
        <Grid item xs={12}>
          <StyledPaper>
            <Typography variant="h6" sx={{ display: 'flex', alignItems: 'center' }}>
              <NotificationsIcon sx={{ mr: 1, color: 'teal' }} /> Alerts & Reminders
            </Typography>
            {/* Add Alerts or Reminders here */}
            <List>
              <ListItem>
                <ListItemText primary="Assignment due: History Essay - Sep 12" />
              </ListItem>
              <ListItem>
                <ListItemText primary="New Quiz Available: Science Chapter 4" />
              </ListItem>
            </List>
          </StyledPaper>
        </Grid>
      </Grid>
    </Box>
  );
};

const StyledPaper = styled(Paper)({
  padding: '20px',
  marginBottom: '20px',
  backgroundColor: '#333',
  color: '#fff',
  borderRadius: '8px',
  boxShadow: '0 4px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2)',
});

export default Dashboard;
